page.title: 07POLITICS:ALLESTREE;QUARNDON.
page.content:
RECENT ELECTIONS IN THIS AREA HAVE RESULTED IN WINS FOR THE CONSERVATIVE PARTY. MOST OF THE LAND IN THE SOUTH OF THE BLOCK IS IN THE DERBY NORTH CONSTITUENCY WHICH ON 9/6/83 RETURNED THE CONSERVATIVE GREG KNIGHT AS ITS M.P. THE RESULT WAS AS FOLLOWS: GREG KNIGHT (CON) 22,303; PHILIP WHITEHEAD (LAB)18,797; STEVE CONNOLLY(LIB)9,924. THIS SEAT HAD BEEN HELD BY LABOUR SINCE 1935 AND BY PHILIP WHITEHEAD SINCE 1970.THE AREA IN THE NORTH OF THE BLOCK IS IN THE CONSTITUENCY OF WEST DERBYSHIRE. IN 1983 MATTHEW PARRIS WAS RE-ELECTED AS M.P. WITH A MAJORITY OF 15,325. ON 2/5/85 IN THE COUNTY COUNCIL ELECTIONS THE LABOUR PARTY GAINED CONTROL OF DERBYSHIRE. IN THE ALLESTREE WARD HOWEVER A CONSERV- ATIVE WAS RETURNED.
S
